Here’s a concise directory of **antique appraisers** serving **Albuquerque**, New Mexico:

---

### **Overview**
Albuquerque offers specialized antique appraisal services through certified professionals experienced in evaluating fine art, furniture, collectibles, and IRS-compliant valuations ([1][2]). Key providers adhere to **USPAP standards** and hold credentials from organizations like the International Society of Appraisers (ISA).

---

### **Antique Appraiser Directory**

#### **Prestige Estate Services**
**Address**:  
300 Menaul Blvd NW  
Albuquerque NM 87107  
**Phone**:  
(844) 378-7253 | *Direct Line*: For Erika Holycross — (844) ITEM-VAL [(483‑6825)](tel:+18444836825)  
**Email**:  
Appraisals@PrestigeEstateServices.com  

##### *Team Members*:
| Name | Specialties | Certifications | Years Active |
|------|-------------|----------------|--------------|
| Edward Kitson | General antiques • Insurance documentation • Divorce/inheritance division | ISA Member • USPAP Compliant | Not Specified |
| Elizabeth Lovett | Fine art collections • Charitable donations • Connoisseurship analysis | ISA Member • USPAP Compliant | Not Specified |
| Stephanie Calman | Remote valuations • Damage/loss assessments • Market trend analysis ([2])

## Directory of Antique Appraisers in Anchorage  

### Overview  
Anchorage hosts specialized antique appraisal services through established auction houses and certified professionals offering expertise across fine art, historical artifacts, jewelry, furniture collections**,** insurance valuations**,** estate liquidation**,** and government asset assessments**. Key providers combine decades of experience**[5]** **[6]** **[7]**.**

---

#### **Alaska Premier Auctions & Appraisals**  
- **Specialties**: General antiques**,** estates**,** fine art**, Native Alaskan artifacts**[6][7][10]**.  
- **Years Active**: Since 2018**[1]**.  
- **Contact**:

- **Services**: Free digital consultations**, onsite evaluations,** auctions,** IRS-compliant reports**[1][6][10]**.**  

#### **Duane’s Antiques*** (*Retiring*)  
- *Note*: Closing after ~45 years specializing Inuit carvings,** ivory,** global antiquities**[5]**.**  

#### Online Options Serving AK:**  
##### *AppraiseItNow* **(Nationwide)**

## Directory of Antique Appraisers in Arlington, Texas  

### **Overview**  
Arlington offers specialized antique appraisal services catering to estate planning, insurance documentation, IRS compliance assessments (**USPAP-certified**), collectibles valuation (coins/bullion), and fair market value estimations[2][4][8]. Key providers combine decades of expertise with modern valuation techniques tailored to historical artifacts[7].

---

### **Antique Appraisal Professionals**  

#### **Joe F. Hutchinson**  
- **Business Details**: Residential/commercial property valuations with potential overlap into personal property/applicable antiques[1].  
- **Address**: 2208 Wilson Drive | *Arlington*, TX 76011  
- **Contact**: ☎️ *(817) 996-5174* | 📧 *Send Email*  
- **Specialties**: General real estate-linked antique valuations (*exact focus unspecified*)[1].  

#### **Anything Goes**  
- **Business Details**: PCGS-authorized dealer specializing in numismatic items (*coins*, bullion)[8]. Offers retail sales + liquidation support alongside appraisal services[6][8].  
- **Address**: *2504 W Park Row* | *Arlington*, TX 76013    
- **Contact**: ☎️ *(817) 542-0862 / (817)723 -7231* | 📧 *Email unavailable*.   
+ 🕒 Hours: Tues–Sat (*9:30 AM–6 PM*)    
+ Certifications:**PCGS Dealer Authorization**[8].  

#### ***Nearby Providers Serving Greater DFW***  

##### Prestige Estate Services (*Fort Worth*)   
+ Specializes In:**Fine art**, furniture provenance analysis**, IRS-compliant charitable donation assessments**, divorce/inheritance divisions**[2][7].   
+ Team:**Edward Kitson**, Elizabeth Lovett**, Stephanie Calman**.    
+ Contact:**☎️ Unlisted | 📧 Use website form**.    

##### Texas Finest Estate Sales (*Mansfield*)   
+ Service Areas:**Mansfield + surrounding regions**.     
+ Expertise:*In-person sales coordination + cleanouts linked to estates containing antiques*.     
☎️ Contact:*Details via Estatesales.org profile*.   

---

### Service Areas & Pricing 
| Provider          | Coverage           | Typical Pricing Range       |
|-------------------|--------------------|-----------------------------|
| Local Appraisers   | Tarrant County     | $400–$900 per report        |
| Regional Firms     | DFW Metroplex      | $600–$1500+, depending on item complexity |

---

### Key Certifications & Standards

Here’s a concise directory of antique appraisers serving Atlanta, Georgia:

---

## Overview  
Atlanta hosts specialized firms offering IRS-compliant valuations for insurance claims, estate planning/resolution, charitable donations (**Prestige Estate Services**[1][8]), liquidation support (**Lott’s Treasures**[5]), and multi-asset evaluations (**AppraiseItNow**[6]). Common specialties include furniture[2][8], fine art[2][9], jewelry[9], collectibles[10], and historical artifacts[10]. Reports meet USPAP standards[9].

---

## Antique Appraiser Directory  

### **Prestige Estate Services**  
- *Specialties*: Antique furniture evaluation (§19th–20th c.), decorative arts provenance research[2][10]; insurance/donation/tax compliance reports  
- *Certifications*: ISA/ASA/AAA-accredited team[1]; USPAP-compliant  
- *Years Active*: Over two decades locally  
- *Contact*: 📞 `844‑ITEM‑VAL` | ✉️ `appraisals@prestigestateservices.com`  

### **Elizabeth Lake Lovett (Prestige)**  
- *Specialties*: European/American paintings (§19th–20th c.), museum deaccessioning advice
